text:
I reckon it would be cool, if you could kinda "JavaDoc" your build.xml script. 
ie, some comment tags for the entire build.xml file, describing the project and 
how to deploy it and some comment tags for each target, describing what the 
target does. Then you could run a doc tool against the build.xml file and 
get "free" documentation of your build procedure.
creator: bluesjasper@yahoo.com
nicolaken@apache.org
text:
I feel quite safe to mark this as invalid, since Ant buildfiles already have a
<description> tag that is there to describe the project and description=""
attribute to describe the targets.

I already generate automatic documentation from them in Centipede, it's  just a
matter of writing a simple xsl file.
